content:
By Britt Around Town • Special to The Cardinal

Everyone’s a member here at The Bucks Club in Jamison, PA! The Bucks Club’s doors are open to anyone in the community who is looking to “Dine, Golf, Swim & Celebrate” in the heart of Bucks County! Join me as I take you on a virtual tour around Bucks County’s best kept secret.

DINE

Good times are always on the menu at The Bucks Pub – the club’s on site restaurant and bar. The pub is open Wednesday through Sunday and offers happy hour from 4pm-6pm. Cozy on up at a table by the fireplace, relax on the patio or pull up a chair at the bar and let The Bucks Pub do the rest.

The menu consists of a selection of shareable appetizers, to salads, soups, steak and more!  The bar has plenty of beer on tap, including brews from Central Bucks’ own Warwick Farm Brewing, and a selection of cocktails and after dinner drinks.

There’s so many reasons to come in for a meal at The Bucks Pub:

• You just spent a whole day out on the golf course

• You want to catch up with a group of friends

• A celebratory dinner

• You don’t feel like cooking and decide to take the family out for dinner instead

• It’s a day that ends with a “Y” 

GOLF

The Bucks Club’s 18 hole golf course was designed in the 1960s by William Gordon and to this day the first 9 holes remain in his original vision. In recent years, the back 9 holes have been updated to fit a more modern style. While golf course is open to the public, there is still an option for membership. The Bucks Club Golf Association (BCGA) offers some pretty great perks, including discounted cart fees and store discounts, 14 day advance tee times, tournaments, scrambles and more! Private golf lessons, golf camps and other events are also available! The Pro Shop is open 7 days a week from 7:30am-4:00pm.

SWIM

The Bucks Club Pool is the one area of the club where memberships are required. The pool is tentatively scheduled to open for the 2022 season on May 28th and registrations are currently being accepted. 

Pool amenities include:

• Poolside restrooms (including  showers & changing areas)    • A poolside snack stand

• Lifeguards   • Special events    • Poolside meal delivery from The BucksPub

• Poolside lounges    • Guest passes (10 available with early registrations or at a minimum cost)

CELEBRATE

There’s always something in life to celebrate! Let The Bucks Club share in the good times by celebrating in The Bucks Ballroom. Whether you are planning a small intimate gathering, or a large group of up to 200 guests, the team at The Bucks Club is sure to make your event one to remember!

• Weddings: Guests looking to #wedinbucksco at The Bucks Club can work with the  events team to plan the wedding day of their dreams! The bride and groom can choose to be married outside overlooking the beauty of the golf course, or inside of The Bucks Ballroom. Lounges, changing areas and lockers are also available on the second floor for bridal parties getting ready for their big day. View The Bucks Club wedding brochure.

• Events & Parties: Utilize The Bucks Ballroom for your next corporate event, networking event, Bar/Bat Mitzvah, bridal/baby shower, parties and more! 

RADIANCE SPA

Located on The Bucks Club property is Radiance Spa which “offers escape from your daily routine into a quiet and serene setting where you can indulge your senses in our unique treatments and unwind.” The spa offers services such as:

• Facials   • Massages   • Body wraps   • Honey treatments   • Oil treatments

• CBD body treatments   • Waxing   • Permanent makeup   • Mens services

• Cancer care   • Spa parties   • And more!

Radiance Spa also offers bridal packages and makeup application to brides tying the knot at The Bucks Club!

The Bucks Club is located at 2600 York Road in Jamison PA  •  www.thebucksclub.com
